sourceMeaningMnemonic: Both a <radical>scooter</radical> and a <radical>car</radical> are things you'll <kanji>take along</kanji> with you. If you want to take both along, you should <kanji>connect</kanji> them to each other to make it easier.
meaningInfo: You can't decide which one you want, so you take along both. Good job they're connected!
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>take along</kanji> the things you need. Anything else, you can do a <reading>ren</reading>tal (<ja>れん</ja>) for.
readingInfo: You remembered your scooter and your car, but you forgot something else! You go to the rental shop and do a rental for that item.
